<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Smoke Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=5770) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Additive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=795" />
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 64 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can add a tarry additive to an alchemical bomb to make it emit smoke. When thrown, in addition to its normal effects, the bomb creates a cloud of smoke in a 10-foot burst. You choose which corner of the target's space (or the space in which the bomb lands) the cloud is centered on. Creatures within that area have the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) condition, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dissipated by a strong wind.
name: Smoke Bomb
